titleStmt.title: The discription of the cittie of Excester, collected and gathered by Iohn Vowel alias Hooker, gentelman and chamberlain of the same cittie
titleStmt.author: Hooker, John, 1526?-1601.

notesStmt.note: Variant: leaves A1-D2 hand-stamped with folio numbers 40-53. These copies are normally found as part 2 of STC 24887 and should be matched to that if possible.
Imperfect as filmed; title page not filmed.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
